TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

summary.span: 表示颁发者名称注册想，其维护一系列可信颁发者，它们加载子应用程序配置文件中的元素，该文件将每个颁发者名称与 X.509 证书关联，该证书为验证颁发者生成的签名所需。

span.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护的受信任颁发者的字典，通过将每个受信任的颁发者的证书映射到引用该颁发者的名称。The class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer. 使用 ASN.1 编码指纹的形式指定证书。The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint. 颁发者名称可以是任意字符串，只要它是唯一的应用程序的作用域内。The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application. 可以通过访问此字典属性。This dictionary can be accessed through the property. 类只能解析 X.509 证书。The class can only resolve X.509 certificates. 将条目下的添加配置文件中指定的受信任颁发者映射[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)元素。The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element. ``元素是子元素的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)并且它是有效时中指定类`type`该元素的属性。The `` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的这些元素的每个文档[WIF 配置架构](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)。For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9). 有关颁发者名称注册表的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about issuer name registries, see the class. 可以从派生来实现你自己配置根据颁发者名称注册表。You can derive from to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry. 重写的方法将取决于您的实现。Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation. 例如，您可以重写方法从自定义配置架构加载配置。For example, you can override the method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema. ## Examples 以下 XML 显示了配置添加集合的安全令牌处理程序。The following XML shows configuration for a added for a collection of security token handlers. ``元素的行为类似于传统的.NET 配置集合，从而允许``，``和``元素作为子元素。The `` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the ``, `` and `` elements as child elements. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddTrustedIssuer (string certificateThumbprint, string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddTrustedIssuer(string certificateThumbprint, string name) cil managed
Public Sub AddTrustedIssuer (certificateThumbprint As String, name As String)
public: void AddTrustedIssuer(System::String ^ certificateThumbprint, System::String ^ name);

param.name: certificateThumbprint
param.span: 发行人的证书指纹的 ASN.1 已编码形式。

span.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
The name of the issuer.

summary.span: 添加一个颁发者到信任发行人字典。

span.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用此方法可添加到颁发者字典。You can call this method to add issuers to the dictionary. 在派生类中，可以调用此方法从方法将颁发者添加到字典。In derived classes, you can call this method from the method to add issuers to the dictionary.

span.span: is or empty.
-or-
is or empty.

exception.span: 已经配置了由 指定的颁布者。

span.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.

exception.span: （发布者已存在于 字典中。）

span.span: (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为当前实例配置的可信颁发者的字典。

span.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

value.span: 包含信任发行人的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典的关键是指纹的证书的 ASN.1 编码形式的受信任颁发者，值为颁发者名称。The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name. 字典包含已在配置中指定的颁发者和已添加了任何其他颁发者方法。The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the method.

param.span: 颁布者姓名被请求的安全令牌。

span.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
Should be assignable as .

summary.span: 返回与指定的 相关的发行人名称，通过映射证书指纹到已信任的发行人字典中的名称。

span.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

returns.span: 如果在 目录中存在令牌的证书指纹的入口为颁布者名称；否则为 。

span.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现搜索字典中指定的 X.509 证书的指纹`securityToken`。The default implementation searches the dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`. 如果找到的项，则返回的颁发者名称否则为`null`返回。If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`securityToken`不能从，`null`返回。If `securityToken` is not assignable from , `null` is returned.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

param.name: customConfiguration
param.span: XML 表示信任发行人的映射将在指定的配置文件中。

span.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

summary.span: 加载配置的可信颁发者。

span.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置基础结构调用方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 调用此方法时，`nodelist`将包含的顶级子元素[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)配置文件中的元素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 其中每项功能可能反过来，还包含属性或子元素，具体取决于为您派生的类定义的配置架构。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 由配置基础结构调用此方法。This method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 默认实现将从配置加载[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)元素 (下配置[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)元素)。The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element). 您可以重写此方法在派生类中你自己自定义配置元素提供支持。You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 配置包含未识别的一个或多个元素。

span.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
